ValidationRule.description: Validates if the End day is greater then the Start day
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Product2.Family, "Parking"), OR( COMM_FirstPeriodEndDay__c <= COMM_FirstPeriodStartDay__c, COMM_SecondPeriodEndDay__c <= COMM_SecondPeriodStartDay__c, COMM_ThirdPeriodEndDay__c <= COMM_ThirdPeriodStartDay__c, COMM_FourthPeriodEndDay__c <= COMM_FourthPeriodStartDay__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The End day should be greater then Start day
